description: I used to love this game, however I cannot play it on Manjaro (KDE) due to immediate freezing of the game whenever I push on a button. The button itself doesn't matter in this case.
When I try to lanch the game it starts playing what I think are the sound affects. dosent even open a new window

This game looks like it might have potential however, if you wear glasses or have vision issues, this game is not for you. It's appears extremely pixelated. I don't know what it was written in but it needs to be developed using some other graphics engine.
Spent 2 days trying to get music to work. OS supports midi. Nothing. #linuxlife

Fun game. Not the most intuitive to learn if you're new to it like me (I couldn't seem to find any tutorial in the game either), but other than that I like it. Would be nice if there were some scenarios bundled with it.

I recently tried out OpenTTD, and I have to say, I was sorely disappointed. Despite its promising premise of being a transport tycoon simulation game, the execution left much to be desired. Let me break it down for you.

First off, let's talk about the graphics. Or should I say, lack thereof? OpenTTD's visuals are about as appealing as a spreadsheet from the '90s. I get it, not every game needs to be a visual masterpiece, but come on, at least give us something that doesn't feel like a blast from the past.

And then there's the gameplay. Oh boy, where do I even start? It's like trying to navigate a maze blindfolded. Sure, there's a manual, but who has the time or patience to sit through pages of instructions just to figure out how to play a game? Call me old-fashioned, but I like my games to be intuitive and easy to pick up, not a chore to decipher.

I was genuinely puzzled when I saw that this game had a 4-star rating. Either I'm missing something major here, or those ratings are seriously skewed. Trust me, save yourself the headache and steer clear of OpenTTD. It's a one-way ticket to frustration town, and I wouldn't wish that on my worst enemy.

Seit über 20 Jahren süchtigmachender , kurzweiliger Spielspass.

TOP Game :-)
Me trae muchos recuerdos de pequeño al estar horas con este juego.

... Mais c'est un super simulateur ! On peut construire de tout et de rien (on peut même construire une statue qui nous représente dans une ville) et on a toujours quelque chose à surveiller ou à construire... Mais j'ai mis 4 étoiles car il fait beaucoup trop chauffer mon ordinateur qui est neuf de 2 mois !

Потрясающая вещь! 

Потягаться с ней может разве что Simutrains, но он, конечно, более страшный и не дотягивает до OpenTTD.
好玩，很經典的遊戲，玩一玩就上癮
